title: 425: Jordan Harbinger on Confidence, Charisma & the Art of Charm
description:
Sal, Adam & Justin chat with Jordan Harbinger, host of the popular podcast The Jordan Harbinger Show. In this episode they dig into a variety of topics including confidence, body language, first impressions, charisma and interviewing Larry King. Check out and subscribe to Jordan's awesome podcast The Jordan Harbinger Show. Learn more at jordanharbinger.com .
